sentences.english: LECTURER: Hello my name is Paulo D'Iorio.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，我是保罗D爱奥利欧。

sentences.english: Marseille offered him a deal, but it was worth around €7 million over three seasons.
sentences.chinese: 马赛给他提供的合同三年才7百万欧。

sentences.english: Why would Ox want to take the skull there?

sentences.english: Rumour has it that he is positioning himself to take over from Mr Papandreou.
sentences.chinese: 有传言称这是因为他要取代潘帕德里欧的位子。

sentences.english: Mamma sarà come Anna in Europa?
sentences.chinese: 里欧妈妈会喜欢安娜吗？

sentences.english: Julio had a different point of view.
sentences.chinese: 朱立欧却有不同的看法。

sentences.english: Clark and Leo have a good time together.
sentences.chinese: 克拉克和里欧相处愉快。

sentences.english: Illyrio thrust his right hand up his left sleeve and drew out a silver locket.

sentences.english: Oh, you've finally got on the track, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，你终于露出马脚了，欧先生。

sentences.english: It is in his garden that Owais waits.
sentences.chinese: 欧维斯在他的花园了等待。

sentences.english: Come on, O-Dog, don't make me chase you to this thing.
sentences.chinese: 好了，欧老弟，别让我逼着你做这件事。

sentences.english: I have named him. I call him Lucian Horace Ovid Virgil.
sentences.chinese: 我叫它卢西安霍里斯欧韦弗尔吉。

sentences.english: The Auxerre right back was named the players' player of the year in his position in France last season.
sentences.chinese: 这位欧赛尔右后卫入选了上赛季法甲年度最佳阵容。

sentences.english: Mr Obama is gambling that he can reshape global opinion.
sentences.chinese: 欧巴马赌注他自己可以改造全球舆论。
